document_data.name: Gordon Cymrych
document_data.mainbody: '''Gordon Cymrych''' was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the mid–6{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|32}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the first son of his predecessor, High King [[Colin Cymrych|Colin]]. His successor was his daughter, [[Miranda Cymrych]].
